sense.gloss: to stick, to paste, to affix
to stretch, to spread, to strain, to tighten, to put up (tent)
to form (e.g. ice on a pond)
to stick out, to put, to slap
to keep a watch on, to be on the lookout
to become one tile away from completion

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑出↑↓だ↓して↑欲↑↓ほ↓しいと↑頼↑↓たの↓んだ↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓に↑切手↑↓きって↓を|↑貼↑↓は↓る|のを↑忘↑↓わす↓れないでね。
sdata.e: Please don't forget to put stamps on the letters I gave you to post.

sdata.j: ↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓に↑切手↑↓きって↓を|↑貼↑↓は↓る|のを↑忘↑↓わす↓れるな。
sdata.e: Don't forget to put a stamp on your letter.

sdata.j: ↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓を↑出↑↓だ↓す↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑切手↑↓きって↓を|↑貼↑↓は↓る|のを↑忘↑↓わす↓れた。
sdata.e: I forgot to put on the stamp before I mailed the letter.

sdata.j: このようなポスターを|↑貼↑↓は↓る|には↑許可↑↓きょか↓が↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓ですし、だいいち↑街↑↓まち↓の↑美観↑↓びかん↓を↑損↑↓そこ↓ないます！
sdata.e: You need permission to put up that sort of poster, and, most of all, you're ruining the looks of the street!

sdata.j: ↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓に|↑貼↑↓は↓る|↑三↑↓さん↓↑銭↑↓せん↓↑切手↑↓きって↓が↑買↑↓か↓えないで、↑幾日↑↓いくにち↓も↑床↑↓とこ↓の↑間↑↓ま↓の↑上↑↓うえ↓に↑置↑↓お↓いてあるようになった。
sdata.e: I could not buy the 3 sen stamp to put on the letter, so it ended up staying for many days on top of the tokonoma.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑出↑↓だ↓して↑欲↑↓ほ↓しいと↑頼↑↓たの↓んだ↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓に↑切手↑↓きって↓を|↑貼↑↓は↓る|のを↑忘↑↓わす↓れないでね。
sdata.e: Please don't forget to put stamps on the letters that I gave you to mail.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑出↑↓だ↓すの↑頼↑↓たの↓んでおいた↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓にさ、↑切手|↑↓きって↓↑貼↑↓は↓る|の↑忘↑↓わす↓れないでよ。
sdata.e: Please don't forget to put stamps on the letters that I gave you to mail.
